Tata Teleservices is betting big on the strength of its network across India to carve out its own unique space in the enterprise space and caters to every communication need of the customer and their ecosystem. Here is a successful deployment ofSchool Bus Tracking Solution for a school,Silver Oaks in Hyderabad. The Company
Silver Oaks school has been recognized as an IB World School for the past few years and offers IB PYP program.The school has started its own Research Center in 2012 to research and explore ways that can optimize learning in a school environment. In doing so, it became one of the premium schools in the city todevelop its own pedagogy. Also, its school transport facility is huge where they have hundreds of school buses as the main facilities. The Requirement
The school was looking for a cost effective, integrated and scalable vehicle tracking solution without any infrastructure challenge. Nowadays, parents are occupied with their jobs that they are unable to check their childâ€™s whereabouts and there is no online solution to trace the school bus which leads to manual dependency. It was challenging for the school to deploy the man power and answer the calls from the parents. The company required School Bus Tracking Services so that parents can see real-time location of their children whenever a child boards the school bus until he gets off the bus. Solution by Tata Teleservices
Tata Teleservices enterprise business created a school bus tracking solution for Silver Oaks International School. This SBT Solution has been installed in 60 school busses with VTS equipment. The solution offers simplified access via e-mail & SMS based location query and alerts as well as prepares and dispatches SMS based work updates.With the help of a web-based interface, the administrator can view information related to the bus on a map. The administrator can track distance from a bus stop, know when the ignition is switched on and off along with over speeding notifications. With an interactive map view of running buses, the administrator can view and get alerts if any bus deviates from their predefined route.Parents receive alerts stating on how soon the bus will be reaching to their bus stop or the school. Outcome
The SBT solution has done wonders, as it becomes clear that this service facilitates administrative tasks that go along with ensuring the safety of a child. In the fast-paced modern world, school bus safety solution isthe necessity for the effective management of school bus transportation. It has benefited the school management as well as parents&guardians.
